head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FLEISCHMAN, JESSICA LEE SOFFER

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FLEISCHMAN, JESSICA LEE SOFFER

block.p: FLEISCHMAN-Jessica Lee Soffer. Died in Florida, February 6, 1998. Far Rockaway High School, Class of 1935, Hunter College, 1939 Phi Beta Kappa. Adored wife of the late Arthur H. Fleischman, M.D., beloved mother of Dana and Laurie, devoted grandmother of Noah and Michael, loving sister of Paul E. Soffer, M.D. and the late Milton D. Soffer; cherished aunt and great aunt, dedicated teacher, lover of mathematics, gifted artist, and vibrant friend.
